EmailTemplate.name: LD_announce donor-dec2011
EmailTemplate.subject: The last message ever from Absolute!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is your last message from "Absolute" - EVER!
Yep, it's true. This is your last email from Absolute that you will ever receive. But it's not because we are falling off the map - it's because we have an exciting announcement about what we have been up to!
http://absolute.org/blog/2011/12/01/the-last-message/
Christal Earle Co-founder Absolute.org
Absolute Suite 400, 44 Hughson St. North Hamilton, ON L8R 1G3 Canada
(866) 432 4464 info@absolute.org www.absolute.org
